tool_description: Calculates precise component dimensions and tolerances based on overall project specifications and joinery requirements.

material_thickness.description: Standard thickness of lumber to be used in inches

joint_types.description: Types of joints to be used in the project

tolerance_level.description: Precision level: rough, standard, or precise

error_messages: Invalid dimensions: All dimensions must be positive numbers
Invalid material thickness: Thickness must be a positive number representing standard lumber sizes
Invalid joint types: Use standard joint names like mortise-tenon, dovetail, dado, rabbet, butt
Invalid tolerance level: Use rough, standard, or precise
Incompatible specifications: Check that material thickness works with overall dimensions
usage: Provide project specifications and material parameters. The tool calculates detailed component dimensions accounting for joint allowances and standard tolerances.
